ComicInfo.Title: World War I (Microscope City); The Lover!
ComicInfo.Summary:
World War I (Microscope City): The colonists discover Microscope City from a previous colony and a city of Winston lookalikes. Milos starts an army marching.
The Lover!: The Black Flame trashes a bar beneath the apartment of Judit Hunyadi, who is targeted by the denizens of the nightmare land.
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Peter B. Gillis
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Tom Sutton
ComicInfo.Inker: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer,Mark Wheatley,Marc Hempel,Kathryn Mayer
